question: 'ab' is a two digit number and 'ccb' is a three digit number such that (ab)2 = ccb, where 'ccb' is greater than 300. What is the value of 'b'?
If a!+b!+c!=abc, where a, b & c are distinct decimal digits, find b.
What is the HCF of 3/5, 7/10, 2/15, 6/21?
Sum of 2 numbers is 128 and their HCF is 8. How many numbers of pairs of numbers will satisfy this condition?
Find the least number exactly divisible by 10, 15, 18 and 30.
Find the least number which when divided by15, 21, 24 and 32 leaves the same remainder 2 in each case.

A car started from Indore to Bhopal at a certain speed. The Car missed an accident at 40Kms away from Indore, then the driver decided to reduce Car speed to 4/5 of the original speed. Due to this, he reached Bhopal by a late of 1hr 15min.Suppose if he missed an accident at 80Km away from Indore and from then he maintained 4/5 of original speed then he would reach Bhopal by a late of 1hour. Then what is the original speed of the Car?

Two places A and B are at a certain distance. Ramu started from A towards B at a speed of 40 kmph. After 2 hours Raju started from B towards A at a speed of 60 kmph. If they meet at a place C then ratio of ratio of time taken by Raju to Ramu to reach Place C is 2:3. Then what is the distance between A and B?

Car A leaves Delhi at a certain time, after 5 hours Car B leaves Delhi in the same direction as of A. Speed of Car A is 20Km/hr and Speed of Car B is 40Km/hr. In how much time Car B will be 20Km ahead of Car A?

A police saw a Thief at a distance of 2km. When Police started chasing him Thief also started running. If the ratio of Speeds of Police to Thief is 5:4. Then thief was caught at a certain distance then how many Kms did police run to catch the Thief?
A bag contains 2 yellow, 3 green and 2 blue balls. Two balls are drawn at random. What is the probability that none of the balls drawn is blue?
There are 15 boys and 10 girls in a class. If three students are selected at random, what is the probability that 1 girl and 2 boys are selected?
Find the odd man out. 1, 3, 9, 12, 19, 29
Find the odd man out. 187, 264, 386, 473, 682, 781

What number will replace '?'
2, 2, 7, ?, 87, 342

What number will replace '?'
6, 8, 8, 22, ?, 151

Which of the following fractions is greater than
3/5 and less than 6/7?

Two ships are sailing in the sea on the two sides of a lighthouse. The angle of elevation of the top of the lighthouse is observed from the ships are 30º and 45º respectively. If the lighthouse is 100 m high, the distance between the two ships is:
Father is aged three times more than his son Sunil. After 88 years, he would be two and a half times of Sunil's age. After further 88 years, how many times would he be of Sunil's age?
Present ages of Kiran and Syam are in the ratio of 5:4 respectively. Three years hence, the ratio of their ages will become 11:9 respectively. What is Syam's present age in years?
